Author: pedrocas
Title: [ICO] Bityond Tokens: Decentralizing Recruitment [ICO]
Body: Bityond Tokens Announcement  Website - White Paper - Telegram - Github - Youtube Facebook - Twitter - Medium - Discord - Linkedin  Decentralizing Recruitment & Talent Management  Bityond is a recruitment and talent management platform that matches candidates to jobs, based on skills, experience, characteristics and availability. Our mission is to give candidates a quick way to find meaningful jobs and employers the power to recruit people with the right skill-set, or to manage employees by skills, experience and availability.  As we transition into a distributed network model we aim at bringing more value to our community, by giving economic incentives via the Bityond Tokens, to any user who participates in the Bityond network.  Bityond Tokens serve 3 purposes:  A. Free Tokens Token holders will receive free tokens during yearly airdrops,  B. Voting As users will be able to vote on new developments and features,  C. Utility As users can spend tokens to sponsor new developments and purchase subscriptions.   Bityond Tokens will be offered to users who:  1.Participate in the ICO  or  2.Use the platform as tokens will be given for free upon completing certain actions  ICO DETAILS Maximum supply: 100,000,000.00 (100 million BYT) ICO: 40,000,000.00 (40 million BYT) Reserved for Bityond users: 50,000,000.00 (50 million BYT) Reserved for Bityond: 10,000,000.00 (10 million BYT) Price 1 ETH = 100,000.00 (100 thousand BYT) Minimum ETH per participant: 0.2 ETH ICO ETH goal amount: 400 ETH  40% - ICO participators | 50% - Bityond users | 10% - Team  https://i.imgur.com/jQ5IKye.jpg  Bityond Team https://i.imgur.com/UKYV4d5.jpg   Bityond 1.0 is LIVE Signup now!   ICO DATE 15 MAY 2018 12:00 UTC, 15 SEPTEMBER 2018 00:00 UTC   ICO PRICE 1 ETH = 100,000.00 BYT   ----------IMPORTANT UPDATE----------   BITYOND 2.0 USABILITY TESTS AVAILABLE!  10,000.00 BYT PRIZE-POOL FOR THE BEST SUGGESTIONS   PROFILE TEST 1 TEST 2 TEST 3  JOBS TEST 1 TEST 2  EMPLOYERS TEST 1 TEST 2 TEST 3  NETWORK & REVIEWS TEST 1 TEST 2

Author: JRODRIGUESSeed
Title: [ICO] Bityond Tokens: Decentralizing Recruitment [ICO]
Body: I totally agree with the previous comments! The idea sounds very consistent and the platform already exists and function well, what is not common in most of ICOs. I will participate as well in the ICO!  I would like to know your opinion about how Bityond is aligned with the future of the labour market, where people have different short-term jobs.

Author: pedrocas
Title: [ICO] Bityond Tokens: Decentralizing Recruitment [ICO]
Body: Thank you Kloosterboer for your amazing comments!!  Insert  Things like Bityond have a potential to change the recruitment market greatly  Hopefully we'll be able to achieve that!  Thank you JRODRIGUESSeed for your kind comments and question!  I would like to know your opinion about how Bityond is aligned with the future of the labour market, where people have different short-term jobs.  That's a key point for Bityond, thank you for asking. I've actually released an article today discussing how companies can actually tackle that problem, simply by incorporating a tokenized model, not only at the infrastructure level, but also at the governance level. This is, if decision making is decentralized we could potentially see a world where companies start to distribute tokens freely, paying for users' time, attention, contents, posts, good values, etc  https://www.ccn.com/whats-next-for-cryptocurrency-distribution-of-power/

Author: JRODRIGUESSeed
Title: [ICO] Bityond Tokens: Decentralizing Recruitment [ICO]
Body: If I contribute to a network with comments/contents/activity is perfectly reasonable that I am compensated for that. On the top of that, I only see benefits in transparency and decentralization. I am excited about these paradigm changes.

Author: luksbit
Title: [ICO] Bityond Tokens: Decentralizing Recruitment [ICO]
Body: Today when I open my browser, there was a news about this ICO. But have not they managed yet 5% of the total in which they want to collect?

Author: pedrocas
Title: [ICO] Bityond Tokens: Decentralizing Recruitment [ICO]
Body: Hello Luksbit, thanks a lot for your question     Yes the news were relating how the ICO was built, how it works and the token purpose; also it was reported in Portugal, as it's the first ICO done under Portuguese regulation. It's quite a new market in Portugal so the news impact didn't cause a "spike" in contributers. More importantly, the news focus the work done between Bityond and the Portuguese Markets Exchange Commission; that's the main reason the ICO did come up in the news a couple times. Links below:  http://www.jornaleconomico.sapo.pt/noticias/bityond-avanca-com-a-primeira-ico-a-partir-de-portugal-300450  http://leitor.jornaleconomico.pt/noticia/bityond-avanca-com-a-primeira-ico-a-partir-de-portugal  https://business-it.pt/2018/04/30/bityond-realiza-primeiro-ico-registado-em-portugal/  https://www.jornaldenegocios.pt/mercados/detalhe/cmvm-criptomoeda-bityond-nao-constitui-um-valor-mobiliario  https://sol.sapo.pt/artigo/612835/emprego-nova-plataforma-adequa-perfis-aos-trabalhos-disponiveis  We're receiving some registrations to participate, so we expect more contributors to come soon!  Thanks for your question. Anything else let me know.  Pedro

Author: dzkrb1966
Title: [ICO] Bityond Tokens: Decentralizing Recruitment [ICO]
Body: frankly, I'm as promising as recruitment projects now. I know several databases on employment. It seems to me that there will be quite a lot of competition.

Author: pedrocas
Title: [ICO] Bityond Tokens: Decentralizing Recruitment [ICO]
Body: Hello dzkrb1966 how are you doing?  Im sure there will be much competition! There's already a lot eheh  I welcome competition. Actually, with tokens users have an incentive to chose all networks. Meaning, if you also get tokens using other platforms why should you stick only to one platform?  Besides we already have a platform released for 1 year, received super important feedback which we've incorporated onto version 2, being released in the Summer.  With this new version and the Bityond tokens, I think we'll crush competition.  Internal databases will disappear, you'll see! The incentive won't be to privatize information, but to make it public. You have my CV in your database? Great, my platform matches your skills, availability, experience, etc with jobs.  That's way better than receiving emails, phone calls, weird messages on linkedin from recruiters desperately trying to find a better match to the position they need to feel.  But again, competition in the cryptocurrency space will be very much welcome!  Thanks!  Give Bityond a try!
